name: inadyn-mt - dynamic DNS client
short_description:
inadyn-mt - inadyn, inadyn-advanced fork.  A multi-OS (*NIX, BSD, NT, 32 bit Win) console/service/daemon dynamic DNS client.  Supports many update services. Adds Win RAS trapping; service install, manage; unicode & language strings; audible alerts; IPv6.

Includes Linux, FreeBSD, Windows exe's, or custom compile with autoconf compiler options interface (see compile options run ./configure --help), for most compact executable and memory footprint.  

Opt out of language support with empty language file parameter option, e.g., --lang_file option with no trailing option parameter.

For single program instance multiple services, see patches:

https://sourceforge.net/tracker/?group_id=209367&atid=1009432&source=navbar

Custom dynamic dns server support and the following are directly supported:

dyndns.org (dynamic, static, & custom)
freedns.afraid.org
zoneedit.com
no-ip.com
3322.org
easydns.com
sitelutions.com
dnsomatic.com
ipv6tb.he.net
tzo.com
dynsip.org
dhis.org...
